statements: SELECT * FROM PrintMediaSchedule;
SELECT publication_name, production_date FROM PrintMediaSchedule;
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaSchedule WHERE print_run_id = 1;
SELECT publication_name, distribution_timeline FROM PrintMediaSchedule WHERE production_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaSchedule ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaSchedule WHERE publication_name = 'Newspaper' ORDER BY production_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT publication_name, production_date FROM PrintMediaSchedule WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT print_run_id, publication_name, production_date, distribution_timeline FROM PrintMediaSchedule WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_name ASC, production_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT publication_name FROM PrintMediaSchedule WHERE production_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(production_date, CURDATE())) AS avg_production_delay FROM PrintMediaSchedule;
SELECT * FROM PrintRun WHERE production_date = '2023-01-08';
SELECT publication_name, production_date FROM PrintRun ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PrintRun WHERE print_run_id = 3 AND publication_name LIKE 'Newspaper%';
SELECT distinct publication_name, production_date, distribution_timeline FROM PrintRun ORDER BY distribution_timeline ASC;
SELECT publication_name, deadline_date FROM PublicationDeadline WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM PrintRun WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY distribution_timeline DESC;
SELECT publication_name, production_date FROM PrintRun WHERE publication_name LIKE '%weekly%' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT publication_name, production_date, distribution_timeline FROM PrintRun WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY distribution_timeline ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_print_runs, publication_name FROM PrintRun GROUP BY publication_name HAVING total_print_runs > 5 ORDER BY total_print_runs DESC;

SELECT PrintRun.print_run_id, PrintRun.publication_name, PublicationDeadline.deadline_date FROM PrintRun JOIN PublicationDeadline ON PrintRun.publication_name = PublicationDeadline.publication_name WHERE PublicationDeadline.status = 'pending' ORDER BY PrintRun.print_run_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PrintRuns;
SELECT * FROM Publications WHERE publication_type = 'Magazine';
SELECT * FROM Publications ORDER BY publication_name ASC;
SELECT publishing_date, production_date FROM PrintRuns WHERE publishing_id = 2;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM Publications JOIN Distribution ON Publications.publication_id = Distribution.publication_id;
SELECT publication_id, publication_name, publication_type FROM Publications;
SELECT * FROM PrintRuns WHERE publishing_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT P.publication_name, D.distribution_date, D.delivery_status FROM Publications P JOIN Distribution D ON P.publication_id = D.publication_id WHERE D.delivery_status = 'delivered';

SELECT P.publication_name, PR.production_date, D.distribution_date FROM Publications P JOIN PrintRuns PR ON P.publishing_id = PR.publishing_id JOIN Distribution D ON P.publication_id = D.publication_id ORDER BY PR.production_date, D.distribution_date DESC;

SELECT P.publication_name, COUNT(D.*), AVG(PR.production_date) FROM Publications P JOIN Distribution D ON P.publication_id = D.publication_id JOIN PrintRuns PR ON P.publishing_id = PR.publishing_id GROUP BY P.publication_name HAVING COUNT(D.*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM PrintRun;
SELECT publication_id, publication_name FROM Publication WHERE publication_type = 'Newspaper';
SELECT print_run_id, print_date, print_location, print_quantity FROM PrintRun ORDER BY print_date DESC;
SELECT publication_name, publication_frequency FROM Publication WHERE publication_frequency = 'Weekly' ORDER BY publication_name ASC;
SELECT production_date, production_location, production_status FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE production_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM PrintRun WHERE print_location = 'New York' ORDER BY print_date DESC;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM Publication WHERE publication_frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE production_location = 'Factory A' AND production_status = 'Completed';
SELECT distribution_date, distribution_location FROM DistributionTimeline WHERE distribution_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type, publication_deadline FROM Publication WHERE publication_frequency = 'Weekly' AND publication_deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PrintRun;
SELECT publication_name, print_date FROM PrintRun WHERE print_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT publication_name, publisher FROM Publication WHERE publisher = 'New York Times';
SELECT production_id, production_date FROM PrintProduction ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT publication_name, distribution_date, location FROM Publication JOIN Distribution ON Publication.publication_id = Distribution.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM PrintRun WHERE print_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT publication_name, print_date FROM PrintRun WHERE print_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT publication_name, publisher, print_frequency FROM Publication WHERE publisher = 'Company A';

SELECT production_date, PrintRun.publication_name, Distribution.location FROM PrintProduction JOIN PrintRun ON PrintProduction.print_run_id = PrintRun.print_run_id JOIN Distribution ON PrintProduction.publication_id = Distribution.publication_id WHERE Distribution.location = 'City X';

SELECT Deadline.deadline_date, Publication.publication_name, Deadline.deadline_type FROM Deadline JOIN Publication ON Deadline.publication_id = Publication.publication_id WHERE Deadline.deadline_date < '2023-06-30';
